verses.name: Leviticus 22:11
verses.text: But if the priest buy any soul with his money, he shall eat of it, and he that is born in his house: they shall eat of his meat.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:12
verses.text: If the priest’s daughter also be married unto a stranger, she may not eat of an offering of the holy things.

verses.name: Leviticus 22:13
verses.text: But if the priest’s daughter be a widow, or divorced, and have no child, and is returned unto her father’s house, as in her youth, she shall eat of her father’s meat: but there shall no stranger eat thereof.
